mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ques (quesno, questitle, quescontent, quesdate, qcateno, memberno, payno, filmno ) VALUES (ques_seq.nextval, #{questitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quescontent}, sysdate, #{qcateno}, #{memberno}, #{payno}, #{filmno})
mapper.select: SELECT quesno, questitle, quescontent, quesdate, qcateno, memberno, payno, filmno FROM ques ORDER BY quesno DESC
